page.title: 14THE AIR RAID SHELTER
page.content: In our village of Bishops Itchington there is an{Air Raid Shelter.} It is hidden in a small kind of wood at the end of High Street. It is about seven feet deep and five feet wide, just the right size for us boys to play in. I like it because outside are some brilliant trees to climb. The trees are as big as my house,{Fir Tree {Cottage.}It is also handy for when it rains or snows. You just go down into the shelter. It is usually warm and dry. But I do not go up much now because living nearby are two big{dogs}which bite. Although, before the dogs were there Michael, Daniel, Stuart and I made the shelter our gang's headquarters. We still like it a lot, although it is older than my dad.
